Title: [shaker] Event notification : "directions" button appears on notification for meeting without rich location, does nothing.
Description:
Event notification has directions  button even when the location is not valid.
Clicking on direction does nothing.

For valid locations, clicking on directions does not open maps. 

teams_meeting_directions_shown.png : Event with teams meeting and location "Some location ABC" but has directions present in the notification

normal_case_doesnotwork.mp4 : Event with valid location, clicking on directions still does nothing
ReproSteps:
1. Create a calendar event
  2. Set the location of the event as any invalid location ( e.g. : "Location ABC")
  3. Observe the notification for the event
ExpectedOutcome: Notification should not have a Directions button since the location does not exist
ActualOutcome:
Notification has a Directions button.
Clicking on it does nothing.
Comments:
OK in 4.0.41 using Google Pixel Android 10 for Hx account
